FAQs

  • Home
  • FAQs

General Questions

  • What is OrthoDirection?

    OrthoDirection is an online platform that connects patients with licensed dental doctors for consultations, appointments, and dental care management. It also provides tools for doctors to manage their practices and patient interactions efficiently.

  • Who can use OrthoDirection?
    • ● Patients: Individuals seeking dental care or consultations
    • ● Doctors: Licensed dental professionals looking to expand their reach and manage their practice online.
  • Is OrthoDirection free to use?
    • ● For Patients: Creating an account is free. Charges apply for consultations, treatments, or other services as per the doctor’s fees.
    • ● For Doctors: There may be platform fees or subscription plans. Details are provided during the registration process.

For Patients

  • How do I book an appointment?
    • ● Log in to your OrthoDirection account.
    • ● Browse through the list of doctors or use filters to find a suitable dentist.
    • ● Click on "Book Appointment" and select a preferred date and time.
    • ● Confirm the booking and make payment, if required.
  • Can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?

    Yes, you can cancel or reschedule an appointment based on the doctor’s cancellation policy. Visit your dashboard, select the appointment, and follow the options provided.

  • Are online consultations as effective as in-person visits?

    Online consultations are effective for initial evaluations, follow-ups, or minor concerns. For complex treatments, the doctor may recommend an in-person visit.

  • How do I share my dental records with the doctor?

    You can upload your records (e.g., X-rays, medical history) securely through your dashboard during the appointment booking process or during the consultation.

  • Is my medical information safe?

    Yes, OrthoDirection prioritizes the security of your data. All medical records and personal information are encrypted and shared only with your consent.

  • How do I pay for a consultation?

    Payments can be made online using credit/debit cards or other available payment methods. Receipts are provided after successful transactions.

For Doctors

  • How do I register as a doctor?
    • ● Click on "Sign Up" and select the "Doctor" option.
    • ● Fill in your professional details, including license information and practice location.
    • ● Submit necessary documents for verification.
    • ● Once approved, you can set up your profile and start accepting appointments.
  • How can I manage my appointments?

    Use the dashboard to view, confirm, or reschedule appointments. Automated reminders are sent to both patients and doctors.

  • Can I set my own consultation fees?

    Yes, you can set your fees based on the type of consultation (e.g., initial consultation, follow-up, emergency).

  • How do I receive payments?

    Payments are transferred directly to your registered bank account. Ensure your payment details are updated in your profile.

  • Can I communicate with patients through the platform?

    Yes, the platform provides secure messaging and video consultation features to facilitate communication with your patients.

  • What happens if a patient cancels an appointment?

    The cancellation policy, including refunds or rescheduling, is determined by you. Patients are informed of your terms before booking.

Technical and Account Management

  • I forgot my password. How can I reset it?

    Click on the “Forgot Password” link on the login page. Enter your registered email address, and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.

  • Can I update my profile information?

    Yes, both patients and doctors can update their profile information through the account settings page.

  • The platform isn’t working correctly. What should I do?

    If you encounter any issues, try refreshing the page, clearing your browser cache, or switching to a different browser. If the issue persists, contact our support team at support@orthodirection.com.

  • Is OrthoDirection available as a mobile app?

    Yes, OrthoDirection is available for download on iOS and Android. The app offers the same features as the website for convenience.

Security and Privacy

  • How is my data protected?

    OrthoDirection uses industry-standard encryption to secure your data. Personal and medical information is shared only with authorized users and only with your consent.

  • Can I delete my account?

    Yes, you can request account deletion through the account settings page. Please note that certain data may be retained as required by law.

Subscribe for the exclusive updates!

We are a team of dentists, hygienists and receptionists who work together to ensure that you receive the best treatment that you require at a very time that suits you.
